extendedInfo.description: Story========After being exiled from his home planet, Studge was unfortunately forced to find a new home.Bringing his clone machine with him, Studge set out to populate the Earth with as many as him as possible.Unfortunately, Studge's are not the most clever forms of life,therefore they have the tendency to walk off cliffs.Gameplay========Studge comes loaded with:- Multiple Maps- Multiple ONLINE highscore boards!- Many bonuses- Hours of competitive gameplay- Extreme stupidity!Controls:========- Touch every Studge that walks by with your finger to make them jump.- Touch a plane that passes by to release the pilot inside, allowing up to 5 bonus points.- Touch and hold a UFO that passes by and drag it onto multiple Studge's to suck them up and quickly gain points.Not all Studge's are the same:- Some walk slower- Some walk faster- Some jump higher- Some stop in the middle of nowhere- Some even jump forever!Compete against others for the leading rank on the online scoreboards!
